TextEng: "Quiet. I'm the one who asks the questions here!"
Text: 조용히 해. 여기서 질문하는 건 나야!

TextEng: "You were dead. I just raised you. Can you remember anything?"
Text: 넌 죽어 있었어. 내가 방금 되살렸지. 뭔가 기억나는 거 있어?

TextEng: "I'm <FirstName>. I saw you in the tavern with Durnan."
Text: 난 <FirstName>이야. 선술집에서 더난과 있는 걸 봤어.

TextEng: "You don't remember me? I spoke to your group at the tavern."
Text: 날 기억 못해? 선술집에서 네 일행이랑 이야기했잖아.

TextEng: "You don't remember me? We spoke at the tavern."
Text: 날 기억 못해? 선술집에서 이야기했잖아.

TextEng: "I'll be going now."
Text: 이만 가볼게.

TextEng: "How about you join me?"
Text: 나랑 같이 가는 게 어때?

TextEng: "That's a good point. I guess I don't need you."
Text: 일리 있네. 네가 필요 없는 것 같아.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "I could still use your help, regardless."
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 그래도 네 도움이 필요해.

TextEng: "I raise you from the dead and now you won't even join up with me?"
Text: 내가 되살려줬는데 나랑 합류도 안 할 거야?

TextEng: "What are you going to do now?"
Text: 이제 뭘 할 거야?

TextEng: "That's probably for the best."
Text: 그게 최선일 거야.

TextEng: "I'm bored with you. I think I'll just kill you now."
Text: 지루해졌어. 이제 그냥 죽여버릴까 봐.

TextEng: "Sorry. Bad joke. Go on - you're free to go."
Text: 미안. 농담이 심했어. 가, 자유야.

TextEng: "I just want the satisfaction of killing you myself." <StartAction>[Kill him.]</Start>
Text: 직접 죽이는 만족감을 느끼고 싶을 뿐이야. <StartAction>[그를 죽인다.]</Start>

TextEng: "This is all the thanks I get for bringing you back to life?"
Text: 되살려 준 것에 대한 감사가 고작 이거야?

TextEng: "I guess you're right. I don't need a reward."
Text: 네 말이 맞는 것 같아. 보상은 필요 없어.

TextEng: "Fine. I feel the need to kill you again, I think."
Text: 좋아. 다시 한번 널 죽이고 싶어졌어.

TextEng: "Why don't you come with me, instead?"
Text: 대신 나랑 같이 가는 게 어때?

TextEng: "Is there anything you can tell me about this area?"
Text: 이 지역에 대해 알려줄 거 있어?

TextEng: "At war? What do you mean?"
Text: 전쟁 중이라고? 무슨 말이야?

TextEng: "Do you know anything about all these mirrors?"
Text: 이 거울들에 대해 아는 거 있어?

TextEng: "That's not really surprising."
Text: 별로 놀랍지 않네.

TextEng: "Do you know where your companions are?"
Text: 네 동료들이 어디 있는지 알아?

TextEng: "Tell me what happened to you, exactly."
Text: 무슨 일이 있었는지 정확히 말해 봐.

TextEng: "How did you get killed?"
Text: 어떻게 죽은 거야?

TextEng: "If I knew how pathetic you were, I wouldn't have bothered raising you."
Text: 네가 얼마나 한심한지 알았으면 되살리는 수고를 안 했을 거야.

TextEng: "I'm sorry. I didn't mean that."
Text: 미안. 그런 뜻이 아니었어.

TextEng: "I don't have time for you, half-breed. Scurry back to the inn before you get killed again."
Text: 잡종, 너한테 쓸 시간 없어. 또 죽기 전에 여관으로 꺼져.

TextEng: "As well as can be expected."
Text: 그럭저럭 괜찮아.

TextEng: "I could use some help. Maybe you could join up with me?"
Text: 도움이 필요해. 나랑 합류하는 게 어때?

TextEng: "Save it. I can't waste my time talking to half-breeds."
Text: 닥쳐. 잡종이랑 이야기하며 시간 낭비할 순 없어.

TextEng: "Something you couldn't do."
Text: 네가 못 했던 일이지.

TextEng: "Do you have a problem with me?"
Text: 나한테 불만 있어?

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "I just wanted to apologize for the way I acted before."
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 전에 내 행동에 대해 사과하고 싶었어.

TextEng: "I should go."
Text: 이만 가볼게.
